text:
Would you like to be entered into a random drawing to anonymously take part in a brief online survey about your use of this app (for a $20 Amazon.com gift card) and a related group discussion (for a $30 Amazon.com gift card)?

If you indicate "Yes" below and you are selected, then the app's administrator will email you with information about your corresponding rights as a potential research study participant. Your choice has no effect on your grade either way, and your teacher will never know if you participate in the study or not.
choices: Yes, enter me in the study participation random drawing
No, do not enter me in the study participation random drawing
